hexcombat.page.misc_combat_patters.get-c: Accepts a position and a radius, returns a list with all positions inside that circle
hexcombat.page.util_spells.shears: Accepts a sheep entity, tries to shear it. Costs 1 amethyst dust
hexcombat.page.combat_spells.potion/slow: Inflicts $(thing)slow fall/$. Base cost is one $(l:items/amethyst)$(item)Amethyst Dust/$ per 3 seconds.
hexcombat.page.combat_spells.potion/wate: Inflicts $(thing)water breathing/$. Base cost is one $(l:items/amethyst)$(item)Amethyst Dust/$ per 5 seconds
hexcombat.page.combat_spells.potion/glow: Inflicts $(thing)glow/$. Base cost is one $(l:items/amethyst)$(item)Amethyst Dust/$ per second
